price: Kuma kamar haka Muke sãka wa wanda ya yawaita,* kuma bai yi ĩmãni da ãyõyin Ubangijinsa ba. Kuma lalle ne azãbar Lãhira ce mafi tsanani, kuma mafi wanzuwa
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَنۡ أَسۡرَفَ وَلَمۡ يُؤۡمِنۢ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِۦۚ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَشَدُّ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ
footnotes: * Wanda ya yawaita, shi ne Musulmi fãsiƙi kõ mai bidi'a yanã ƙara abin da ba a sani ba a cikin addini, ya yawaita shi. Shi ma ya shiga a cikin wahalar dũniya. Kuma ta Lãhira ta fi tsanani.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika najzī man asrafa walam yu'min biāyāti rabbihi walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati ashaddu wa-abqā
